I am an applied statistician with a specific interest in spatial and spatio-temporal statistics for ecology and environmental sciences. I work at University Bretagne Sud as an associate professor of statistics (IUT Vannes, Data Science department) in the GIS group of Lab-STICC (UMR 6285).

<!-- My research intend to develop statistical tools to inform spatial planning in a context of climate change and threats on ecosystems. -->

<!-- and environmental sciences -->
